name: Track of Secrets
description:
sezon ayarı. Gelin ve yaratılacak olan bu heyecan verici maceraya katılın.
  1. What does our game called Track of Secrets, which we have worked hard to reveal as the A'BIDEY-İ EBEDİ team, promise you? It offers you a short and enjoyable game experience with different traps in each episode, armed drones trying to prevent you from reaching your goal, and a non-repeating level design. Are you ready to overcome these obstacles and become an agent who masterfully overcomes his enemies? We are happy to see you among us in this new generation game that blends FPS and PLATFORM genres. Come and join this exciting adventure created by our team.
